VR Experience Launcher

Server Setup Instructions

Step 1: Launch the Python Server

Windows:

Open Command Prompt and navigate to the directory where server.py is located. Then run:

python server.py

macOS:

Open Terminal and navigate to the directory where server.py is located. Then run:

/opt/homebrew/bin/python3 /path/to/your/directory/server.py

You should see: "Server started at http://localhost:8000"

Step 2: Launch VR Experience

  1. Make sure the Python server is running (see Step 1)
  2. Use a WebXR-compatible browser (Chrome recommended)
  3. Connect your VR headset if using one
  4. Open your browser and go to http://localhost:8000
  5. Navigate to the directory of your VR experience
  6. Allow any browser permissions when prompted
